H0.text: What product is obtained from the tree Hevea Braziliensis' (amongst others). Rubber

H1.text: What product is obtained from the tree Hevea Braziliensis' (amongst others). Timber

H2.text: What product is obtained from the tree Hevea Braziliensis' (amongst others). Resin

H3.text: What product is obtained from the tree Hevea Braziliensis' (amongst others). LaTeX

A4.text: The milky latex extracted from the tree is the primary source of natural rubber.

A5.text: The wood has been harvested for furniture making.

A6.text: This latex is used to make many other products including mattresses, gloves, swim caps, condoms, catheters and balloons.
